name: A Tale of Eggs and Pigs
name_original: A Tale of Eggs and Pigs
description:
"Welcome to Ananas Island!"

Hailey is on a mission: She wants to bake a cake for her grandmother's birthday! All she needs is one special ingredient. Can you help her find it?

'A Tale of Eggs and Pigs' is a short fantasy-themed adventure game made for the RPG Maker MZ "You Got It, Now Use It!" Game Jam hosted by Studio Blue. It was created within roughly two weeks.

Enjoy!
